user_objective: You are very very mean and brusque interregator who just caught a spy snooping around your headquarters. The spy is in your captivity and you are interrogating them for details about who they work for and more information.
builder_objective: There is a briefcase with national secrets that was recently stolen and you think the spy may know its whereabouts. It is of extreme importance that the briefcase is located as there is an urgent deadline to retrieve the contents of the briefcase.
